App Masters
Description: Want to build a top 10 mobile app or game? Learn from the top mobile app developers in the space as they share tips and tricks on how they built their business. Topics range from mobile marketing to mobile game development to mobile services. If you want to succeed in the mobile space, this podcast delivers invaluable lessons from successful mobile entrepreneurs.

Description: Release Notes is a weekly podcast about the business of Mac and iOS indie software development. We discuss inspiration, design, trends, and tools — everything but the code.
